help.entry:
AC
"AC" is your armor class. It is a number from -10 to 10, roughly defined as follows:
AC Roughly equivalent to ----------------------------------------------------------- 10 Naked person 0 Very Heavily armored (Plate mail, and "two shields") -10 Armored battle tank
The score command displays your armor class as a number such as 78/10; this means 78 on a scale from -100 to 100 (i.e., 7.8 on the scale from -10 to 10.)
See also: SCORE
